thread.title: Ed Sheeran adds second Philadelphia date to this summer’s ‘Divide’ tour
thread.title_full: Ed Sheeran adds second Philadelphia date to this summer’s ‘Divide’ tour

author: Nick Vadala
title: Ed Sheeran adds second Philadelphia date to this summer’s ‘Divide’ tour
text:
Divide” tour, putting him in Philadelphia for two consecutive nights this summer. 
, which is currently sold out. Tickets for the new show go on sale at 10 a.m. Friday, March 24, via the Wells Fargo Center website and box office, or by phone at 800-298-4200. 
The Thinking Out Loud” singer last played Philadelphia at The Mann Center in May 2015 as part of his “Multiply” tour that year. 
÷ (“divide”), hi slatest album, which was released earlier this month. The album, which features singles “Shape of You” and “Castle on the Hill,” is on target to become the year’s biggest debut on the Billboard 200 so far, according to Billboard . 
I want to do stadiums everywhere,” Sheeran said in an interview with Rolling Stone earlier this month. “Like George Strait’s level — he tours every four years, does a couple of stadiums and then [expletive] off again.” 
’s “Divide” tour is available on the artist’s official website . | Updated:
